text:
Playing with the ball after a long time...
It really uses up a lot of energy, doesn't it?

Yeah...
It's almost like... a lesson...

We got a good workout!
Got really into it.
It's a relief that today's a day off from lessons.

Hehe, if we had a lesson after this,
we might end up too tired to move.
Well, having good stamina is always a plus...

While having fun like this and building up our stamina,
training will be so much more enjoyable!

Hehe... Yeah.
Time flies when we're having fun together.

In the end, we've been playing all day.
It might actually be a good addition to our training.
